flavor: Some worlds possess a hidden core where life's essence constantly surges.

foreign_names.flavor: Manche Welten besitzen einen verborgenen Kern, in dem die Essenz des Lebens ständig wogt.
foreign_names.name: Ändergewölbe
foreign_names.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.{1}: Das Ändergewölbe wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 2/2 Kreatur mit allen Kreaturentypen. Es ist immer noch ein Land.

foreign_names.flavor: Algunos mundos poseen un núcleo oculto donde la esencia de la vida surge constantemente.
foreign_names.name: Mutabóveda
foreign_names.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{1}: La Mutabóveda se convierte en una criatura 2/2 con todos los tipos de criatura hasta el final del turno. Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreign_names.flavor: Certains mondes recèlent un noyau caché d'où jaillit en permanence l'essence de la vie.
foreign_names.name: Mutecaveau
foreign_names.text: {T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.{1} : Le Mutecaveau devient une créature 2/2 avec tous les types de créature jusqu'à la fin du tour. C'est toujours un terrain.

foreign_names.flavor: Alcuni mondi possiedono un cuore nascosto dove l'essenza della vita pulsa continuamente.
foreign_names.name: Grotta Mutevole
foreign_names.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{1}: La Grotta Mutevole diventa una creatura 2/2 con tutti i tipi di creatura fino alla fine del turno. È ancora una terra.

foreign_names.flavor: いくつかの世界は、生命の本質が常に噴出する見えざる核を持っている。
foreign_names.name: 変わり谷
foreign_names.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{1}：ターン終了時まで、変わり谷はすべてのクリーチャー・タイプを持つ２/２のクリーチャーになる。これは土地でもある。

foreign_names.flavor: 몇몇 차원의 중심에는 생명의 정기를 분출하는 숨은 핵이 있다.
foreign_names.name: 변이의 방
foreign_names.text: {T}: {1}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{1}: 변이의 방은 턴종료까지 모든 생물 유형인 2/2 생물이 된다. 변이의 방은 생물이 된 후에도 여전히 대지다.

foreign_names.flavor: Alguns mundos possuem um núcleo oculto de onde a essência vital é irradiada constantemente.
foreign_names.name: Caverna Mutável
foreign_names.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{1}: Caverna Mutável torna-se uma criatura 2/2 com todos os tipos de criatura até o final do turno. Ela ainda conta como um terreno.

foreign_names.flavor: У некоторых миров есть скрытое ядро, в котором непрестанно пульсирует сама сущность жизни.
foreign_names.name: Преображающаяся Пещера
foreign_names.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{1}: Преображающаяся Пещера становится существом 2/2 со всеми типами существ до конца хода. При этом она остается землей.

foreign_names.flavor: 有些世界具有隐藏的核心，在该处生命的本质不断地奔腾。
foreign_names.name: 易形地窖
foreign_names.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{1}：直到回合结束，易形地窖成为2/2生物并具有所有生物类别。它仍然是地。

foreign_names.flavor: 有些世界具有隱藏的核心，在該處生命的本質不斷地奔騰。
foreign_names.name: 易形地窖
foreign_names.text: {T}：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。{1}：直到回合結束，易形地窖成為2/2生物並具有所有生物類別。它仍然是地。

name: Mutavault
original_text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

rulings.text: Although Mutavault has all creature types while it’s animated, it does not have the changeling keyword ability.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.
Examples of creature types include Sliver, Goblin, and Soldier. Creature types appear after the dash on the type line of creatures.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.
